name: JOE (Roseto)
description:
This is my first game made by Unity.

To make this game, I based on 2 big Indies that I loved at the time.
The Stanley Parable and The Unfinished Swan.
With this project I try to pay homage to these games.
Although it has not been exactly as I wanted, I am happy with the result obtained considering that it is the first game I created.
I will continue working hard to create more games and improve this.
I hope you enjoy it.
